title: Derailed
description: Eighteen-year-old Ember Wallace is a magical misfit. Her power has a mind of its own and a nasty habit of killing anyone it perceives as a threat. She’s resorted to sleeping in the trees in order to get some peace from her neglectful paranoid father. Scorned by the town, Ember’s dreams of acceptance has never seemed further out of reach.If that wasn't enough, their caste system doesn't tolerate deviants. If Ember doesn't prove herself she'll be killed, or worse, exiled to the wastelands. Desperate, Ember studies day and night, refusing to surrender to despair. She never thought she would be coveted by two rival castes poised for war. Now, Ember’s worst tormentors want her dead for surpassing them.Ember is about to learn that in a world which prizes talent above all else, recognition isn’t only dangerous. It can get you killed.Don't wait another minute. Try out Derailed today.
author: S.G. Dean
